did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Black and white glass lantern slides.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Black and white glass lantern slides of portaits of various botanists from the 1500s-1900s, used by Professor Sharp in his lectures.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Black and white glass lantern slides of portaits of various botanists from the 1500s-1900s, used by Professor Sharp in his lectures.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Lester Sharp lantern slide collection, #6690. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p: A set of slides prepared by Barbara McClintock and Lester Sharp for the course on cytology at Cornell University was sent from Cornell to the Hunt Institute for Botanical Documentation at Carnegie Mellon University.

did.unittitle: Edward Bausch, William Busch, Carl Lomb, A.E. Drescher
R. A. Harper, B. Nemec, G. Tischler
University of Penn. - Botanical Gardens and Dorimitory
